title: Dinner Set Neo Black- 18 Pcs
name: Neo Black 18Pcs Dinner Set With Box
description: Neo Black is 100% made in Portugal and mostly handmade. Neo Black is completely recyclable and maintains its quality for several years if properly cared for.
details: 6 pcs of Table Spoon, L: 21.2 cm
6 pcs of Table Fork, L: 21.5 cm
6 pcs of Table Knife, L: 22.1 cm
remarks: Use warm to hot water, neutral soap and a soft sponge or cloth
To maintain or recover the original shine and remove any spots caused by improper washing, use a soft cloth with a few drops of lemon juice or ethyl alcohol
Be especially careful with knife blades. Due to their high cutting power, they’re more susceptible to oxidation and should be dried immediately after washing.
After each use, remove food residues in order to avoid prolonged contact with the cutlery.
Place all the cutlery in the silverware basket in the washing machine with the handles facing down and separate knives from others
We highly recommend that after each machine cycle all cutlery is taken out of the machine and immediately dried with a soft cloth
Keep away from other metallic objects during the washing cycle
To maintain or recover the original shine and remove any spots caused by improper washing, use a soft cloth with a few drops of lemon juice or ethyl alcohol

Belo Inox cutlery that uses special materials and finishes, such as PVD, gold, silver and others, must be exclusively machine washed. In addition to all the machine washing recommendations, if your Belo Inox set has a special finish, it should be washed at below 60º temperatures and using detergents with phosphate levels below 10%.
On any silverware featuring a resin/fiber handle, such as our NEO model, the handle natural color can be revived by hydrating it with buttery lotion.
Don’t store your cutlery in high humidity places.

On any silverware featuring a resin/fiber handle, such as our NEO model, the handle natural color can be revived by hydrating it with buttery lotion.
Don’t store your cutlery in high humidity places.

name: Neo Black Gold 18Pcs Dessert Set With Box

remarks: Use warm to hot water, neutral soap and a soft sponge or cloth
To maintain or recover the original shine and remove any spots caused by improper washing, use a soft cloth with a few drops of lemon juice or ethyl alcohol
Be especially careful with knife blades. Due to their high cutting power, they’re more susceptible to oxidation and should be dried immediately after washing.
After each use, remove food residues in order to avoid prolonged contact with the cutlery.
Place all the cutlery in the silverware basket in the washing machine with the handles facing down and separate knives from others
We highly recommend that after each machine cycle all cutlery is taken out of the machine and immediately dried with a soft cloth
Keep away from other metallic objects during the washing cycle

title: Minimill
name: Pepper and salt mills MINIMILL
description: Although salt and pepper mills are not classic tabletop products, they are essential accessories on a laid table. So that the functional salt and pepper mills harmoniously match all the table decorations, there’s now the salt and pepper MENAGE MINIMILL. The elegant combination of stainless steel with acrylic glass and acacia wood shows that even small things can have true greatness. The high quality, solid acacia wooden tray with brushed stainless steel handle enhances the overall appearance and well-known excellent practical function from AdHoc. As a result, the MENAGE MINIMILL remain a classic combination of aesthetic appearance and technology. Behind the elegant housing is the same high performance CeraCut® ceramic grinder found in large mills that can be adjusted from coarse to fine – making these the smallest mills in the world with adjustable grinder! The high performance CeraCut® ceramic grinder is tougher than steel. This means it has an extremely long life as the grinder is resistant to wear and corrosion. The spices are stored in an acrylic container and transformed into spice powder in no time at all. The MENAGE MINIMILL is also a real delight as the mills are always in the right spot, the table is kept lovely and clean and it goes without saying that they are easy to place back.

title: Chilli Cutter Pepe
name: Chilli cutter PEPE
description: AdHoc´s original PreciseCut®: Small things make the difference! It is the right usage of miscellaneous herbs and spices that turns a dish into a flavorful treat. Apart from the selection of proper aromas it all comes down to their correct treatment.AdHoc developed the PreciseCut® to enable the flavours of the different herbs and spices that are used to unfurl in full. The original AdHoc PreciseCut® has special stainless steel blades with sharply etched teeth. They are designed so that dried herbs and spices are cut rather than ground. The flavours unfurl in full, creating a brand new sensation of taste!
remarks: With patented original PreciseCut®. The dried herbs and spices are cut, not ground, and can thus perfectly unfold their individual aroma
Aroma bottom cap: protects the spices and keeps the working  surface clean
Suitable for: chilli, ginger, pink pepper, fennel, caraway, coriander, mustard seed, etc.

title: Herbs And Spice Cutter
name: Herbs and spice cutter MOLTO
description: Refining dishes using spices is indisputably one of the ultimate skills with cooking. When using dried herbs and spices they can be prepared in a variety of ways. Dried herbs and spices are chopped up as small as possible with the MOLTO herb and spice cutter. The original AdHoc PreciseCut® has a special stainless steel blade with etched, razor-sharp teeth. This is designed so that dried herbs and spices are cut instead of ground. This releases the spices’ essential oils and therefore their full flavour. An aroma sealing cap ensures a clean work area and protects the spices. The top lid can be removed easily to refill it.

title: Small Humidor
name: Electric Cigar Humidor, Approx. Number of Cigars 400-500 pcs
description: Taking Care Of The Cigar Freshness And Humidity Could Be A Very Difficult Task. Thanks To Our Electric Humidor This is Possible Hassle-Free. All Humidors Come With A Built-In  Thermostat  And Humidity Level Can Be Adjusted Easily.
details: Storage Quantity: Approx. 400-500 (Pcs) Varies According To The Size Of The Cigar,
remarks: Open the package and check the accessories.

Place and install the humidor  in a dry,  and well ventilated area. Do not place it near any heat source, such as an area with direct heat exposure from the sun or near the oven. The higher the temperature inside the house, the more power it consumes.
The room temperature should be between +10C to +38C.
Ventilation - it is recommended to placed the Humidor near to the  wall in order to get well-ventilation, don't cover the air vent.
Adjust the legs to make sure it is in a horizontal position.
The Humidor is covered with plastic to protect it during transportation and can be removed after placing it before usage.

In order to keep all the systems running well, do not connect the power while placing the Humidor. Wait for about one or two hours before plugging the device.  For first usage add 750ml water in the water tank.
When the Humidor is used in an area with high humidity, it is recommended to always monitor the level of humidity showing on the screen. Should the humidity level

be very high, we recomment to use a cloth to wipe the excess water and to remove warer from the water tank. If the humidor is being used in a a dry area we recommend to add between 500-1000ml water in the water tank for the  first usage. Always monitor the humidity level displays to make sure the humidity level is in the right percentage. The humidity level showing low, then, we recommend to add 500ml water inside.

title: Round Edge Humidor
name: Round Edge Humidor
description: The humidor's almond finish and exquisite routed design make it an exceptional selection for the beginner or experienced cigar connoisseur. It includes a hygrometer and a detachable humidifier that can be filled with distilled water to sustain the ideal 68%-75% humidity, so you can always be certain that your cigars are kept in the right environment.
details: Dimensions: W26.03cm x D22.22cm x H10.79cm
remarks: Setting Up: When setting up the humidifier for the first time, remove any dust from the manufacturing process by wiping down the interior with a clean, dry cloth. To begin, if the humidor is new or has not been used for some time, place a small shallow bowl or container of distilled water inside the box. Close the lid and let it acclimate for 12-24 hours. Once the time has passed, if a large portion of the water has evaporated, re-fill the bowl a second time and leave it inside the cigar humidor for another 24 hours. Once the water stops evaporating, proceed to the next step "Charging the Humidifier".

Just before loading cigars into the humidor, remove the cigar humidifier unit from the box (this is the sponge like plastic device that is soaked in distilled water). Submerge the cigar humidifier in distilled water or humidifier solution for 30 minutes. Remove it from the water or solution, dry and set it face down on a paper towel for 30 minutes. This is to allow excess water to escape from the humidifier so that water leakage on the cigars is avoided. Once this step is complete, secure the humidifier to the inside of the box using the incuded velcro adhesive or magnets. The humidor is now seasoned and the cigars can now be set inside.

For the first few days after the humidor is filled with cigars, be sure to occasionally check its hygrometer(if your humidor includes one) to ascertain that the humidifier does not require resoaking. If your humidor does not come with a hygrometer, simply re-soak your humidifier once every 2-3 weeks to keep your cigars in check. For drier environments, resoak every 1.5-2weeks. A reading of 68-70% relataive humidity is most desirable, although a bit above or below (64-72% depending on preference) is not detrimental to your cigars. Once the humidity drops below the ideal chosen relative humidity percentage, it is time to re-charge the humidifier. If the desired humidity is still not reached or the cigar seems a bit dry, consider adding additional humidification devices (humidifier gel jars, gel tubes, additional humidifiers or a shot glass/shallow container of distilled water).

Occasionally, a humidor will become overly saturated or it shumidity level will be too high. If this is the case, leave the humidor open partially to allow some of the moisture to escape or add additional cigars into the humidor. The cigars will assist in absorbing some of the excess humidity. If this still is not sufficient in reducing the mositure level, remove the humidifier for a period of time.

The  Spanish cedar interior features a removable tray and adjustable divider with another storage space underneath to section your cigars. Place and install the humidor  in a dry,  and well ventilated area. Do not place it near any heat source, such as an area with direct heat exposure from the sun or near the oven. The higher the temperature inside the house, the more power it consumes.
The room temperature should be between +10C to +38C.
Ventilation - it is recommended to placed the Humidor near to the  wall in order to get well-ventilation, don't cover the air vent.
Adjust the legs to make sure it is in a horizontal position.
The Humidor is covered with plastic to protect it during transportation and can be removed after placing it before usage.

In order to keep all the systems running well, do not connect the power while placing the Humidor. Wait for about one or two hours before plugging the device.  For first usage add 750ml water in the water tank.
When the Humidor is used in an area with high humidity, it is recommended to always monitor the level of humidity showing on the screen. Should the humidity level

be very high, we recomment to use a cloth to wipe the excess water and to remove warer from the water tank. If the humidor is being used in a a dry area we recommend to add between 500-1000ml water in the water tank for the  first usage. Always monitor the humidity level displays to make sure the humidity level is in the right percentage. The humidity level showing low, then, we recommend to add 500ml water inside.

title: Chalet Glasstop Humidor
name: Chalet Glasstop Humidor
description: Humidors are designed to maintain constant humidity for optimum cigar storage.  Choose from our range of designs, sizes, and finishes from classic desktop cigar humidors to functional end tables and cabinet displays.  his humidor features an elegant cherry finish, a see through glass top, an adjustable divider along with a humidifier and external hygrometer.
details: Dimensions: W26.67cm x D22.22cm x H10.79cm
remarks: Setting Up: When setting up the humidifier for the first time, remove any dust from the manufacturing process by wiping down the interior with a clean, dry cloth. To begin, if the humidor is new or has not been used for some time, place a small shallow bowl or container of distilled water inside the box. Close the lid and let it acclimate for 12-24 hours. Once the time has passed, if a large portion of the water has evaporated, re-fill the bowl a second time and leave it inside the cigar humidor for another 24 hours. Once the water stops evaporating, proceed to the next step "Charging the Humidifier".

Just before loading cigars into the humidor, remove the cigar humidifier unit from the box (this is the sponge like plastic device that is soaked in distilled water). Submerge the cigar humidifier in distilled water or humidifier solution for 30 minutes. Remove it from the water or solution, dry and set it face down on a paper towel for 30 minutes. This is to allow excess water to escape from the humidifier so that water leakage on the cigars is avoided. Once this step is complete, secure the humidifier to the inside of the box using the incuded velcro adhesive or magnets. The humidor is now seasoned and the cigars can now be set inside.

For the first few days after the humidor is filled with cigars, be sure to occasionally check its hygrometer(if your humidor includes one) to ascertain that the humidifier does not require resoaking. If your humidor does not come with a hygrometer, simply re-soak your humidifier once every 2-3 weeks to keep your cigars in check. For drier environments, resoak every 1.5-2weeks. A reading of 68-70% relataive humidity is most desirable, although a bit above or below (64-72% depending on preference) is not detrimental to your cigars. Once the humidity drops below the ideal chosen relative humidity percentage, it is time to re-charge the humidifier. If the desired humidity is still not reached or the cigar seems a bit dry, consider adding additional humidification devices (humidifier gel jars, gel tubes, additional humidifiers or a shot glass/shallow container of distilled water).

Occasionally, a humidor will become overly saturated or it shumidity level will be too high. If this is the case, leave the humidor open partially to allow some of the moisture to escape or add additional cigars into the humidor. The cigars will assist in absorbing some of the excess humidity. If this still is not sufficient in reducing the mositure level, remove the humidifier for a period of time.

Each collection includes asectioned tray for fussy eaters, a plate, bowl, cup and cutlery.

title: Monaco Cafetiere Red
name: La Cafetiere Monaco 3 Cup Cafetiere Red
description: Combining colour in the kitchen with the theatrical element of brewing in glass, the Monaco Cafetière brings expert coffee into the home. With a vintage cream frame with a sleek enamel effect and a glass beaker to show rich coffee colours, the Monaco provides a satisfying sensory experience. To ensure a smooth blend, the Cafetière features a stainless steel plunger and fine-mesh filter, with an in-built strainer attached to the lid. The Monaco is a stylish model available in a selection of contemporary colours, embodying timeless design and eye-catching flair. The large size makes it ideal for hosting in the home.
details: Materials: stainless steel; heat-resistant borosilicate glass
imageTitle: La Cafetiere Monaco 8 Cup Cafetiere Red

title: Monaco Cafetiere Dark Grey
name: La Cafetiere 8 Cup Monaco Cafetiere Dark Grey
description: A luxuriously modern French press, coffee lovers will adore this Monaco cafetiere from La Cafetière. Beautifully crafted in a cool grey frame with a sleek enamel effect, this piece features glass windows so you can clearly see when your coffee is blended to perfection.The Monaco also has a stainless steel plunger and filter, with an in-built strainer attached to the lid. The Monaco cafetiere is designed to slow down modern life and allow coffee lovers to take the time out to thoroughly enjoy renewing coffee rituals. Combining traditional techniques with a stylish model, this cafetiere brings authentic cafe culture to the home and will look stunning in any kitchen.
details: Materials: stainless steel; heat-resistant borosilicate glass
imageTitle: La Cafetiere 3 Cup Monaco Cafetiere Dark Grey

title: Salt And Pepper
name: Hammered Brass Pepper Mill
description: This MasterClass salt or pepper mill combines outstanding performance with elegant design for everyday and tabletop use.  With a highly durable non-rust ceramic grinding mechanism that cuts through salt with ease for long lasting performance and a carbon steel construction that strips and grinds peppercorns effortlessly to unlock the full flavour of food when seasoning.  With an easy-turn mechanism and interchangeable caps for both salt and pepper it is the perfect gift or addition to any tabletop.

title: Salt And Pepper
name: Hammered Copper Salt Mill
description: This MasterClass salt or pepper mill combines outstanding performance with elegant design for everyday and tabletop use.  With a highly durable non-rust ceramic grinding mechanism that cuts through salt with ease for long lasting performance and a carbon steel construction that strips and grinds peppercorns effortlessly to unlock the full flavour of food when seasoning.  With an easy-turn mechanism and interchangeable caps for both salt and pepper it is the perfect gift or addition to any tabletop.

title: Brushed Gold Teapot
name: La Cafetiere Edited Four Cup Le Teapot Brushed Gold
description: This stunning Le Teapot brings the contemporary tea experience into the home. One of the most popular La Cafeti ère models, this large teapot has been styled in the newest on-trend metallic as part of this premium collection. This design is perfect for the contemporary tea drinker as it features a removable infuser, making it suitable for both loose leaf tea and tea bags.This beautifully curved Le Teapot has a luxury brushed gold finish frame with a glass body to view the delicate colours of the infusion process. Crafted in stainless steel with heat resistant borosilicate glass.
imageTitle: La Cafetiere Edited Four Cup Le Teapot Brushed Gold

title: Cafetiere Gun Metal Grey
name: La Cafetiere Edited Double Walled 8 Cup Cafetiere Gun Metal Grey
description: This striking Cafetière brings the finest coffee experience into the home. One of the most popular La Cafetière models, this Cafetière has been styled in a dark metallic as part of this premium coffee collection. Brushed gunmetal is combined with a brushed chrome lid and minimalist product shape to add an industrial edge to coffee. This large Cafetière has a double walled design which will keep contents hotter for longer and allow coffee lovers to relax and enjoy long breakfasts and catch ups without having to brew twice. Constructed in stainless steel, this Cafetière has a PVD coating which means the gunmetal colour cannot scratch or peel off unlike traditional paints and lacquers. Etched La Cafetière branding completes this prestigious design.
imageTitle: La Cafetiere Edited Double Walled 8 Cup Cafetiere Gun Metal Grey

description: This collection portraying a geometric pattern is simple, modern and tailored."Bogart Platinum" is named after the famous American actor, Humphrey Bogart, who has become a cultural icon and is considered the epitome of 1940’s “cool”.
imageTitle: Bogart Platinum 12PC Tea Set in a  Gift Box

title: Accompanist RoundVegetable
name: Accompanist RoundVegetable
description: Accompanist is the epitome of simple elegance featuring a single gold rim on a lustrously glazed white bone china. Rich gold accents on the cup handle and other accessory pieces add a touch of distinction that gives the pattern a sophistication that will never go out of style. The simplicity of the pattern makes its own statement, and at the same time provides a backdrop for any table setting theme.

unit: Sold In A Box Of 6 Pcs

title: All Purpose Glasses Set
name: All Purpose, Climats
unit: Sold In A Box Of 6 Pcs
description: Three deceptively simple wine glasses, the Climats range is brilliantly adaptable for both formal and relaxed occasions. Including a fuller bodied glass for bigger red wines, a slimmer glass for rosé, and a medium glass for whites, each item is perfectly balanced with a fine stem and sturdy base. The lip of the glass is crisp and defined, narrowly tapering towards the brim in order to capture the fullness of the wine’s aromas. These are a set of glasses you will want to use again and again.

Sold in a box of 4 pcs

title: Big Gin & Tonic Glasses Set
name: Big Gin & Tonic, Vintage
unit: Sold In A Box Of 6 Pcs
description: The clean lines and minimal design of these NUDE Vintage gin and tonic glasses prove that less is definitely more when it comes to glassware. Shaped to the highest standard from lead-free crystal, perfect for cocktail lovers and drink explorers.
details: Measurements: H: 18  cm / Dia.  8.4 cm Capacity: 585 ml
Sold in a box of 6 pcs

title: Whisky Glasses Set
name: Heavy Base whisky Glasses
unit: Sold In A Box Of 4 Pcs
description: A modern interpretation of the classic whisky glasses, this NUDE No.9 set typifies the collection’s vision of straightforward, functional and aesthetic design. Made from clear lead-free crystal, the distinctive effect comes from the sculptural cone motif that brings a unique sense of lightness to the clean, heavy-bottomed silhouette.
details: Measurements: H: 10.4 cm / Dia. 9.2 cm/Capacity:  350 ml
Sold in a box of 4 pcs

title: Crystal Duo Wine Glasses
name: Duo Wine Glasses
description: Flip your red wine glass, and here it is: your white wine glass at the ready. The aptly named, double-sided NUDE Red Or White set by Ron Arad demonstrates both functionality and radical boldness. Crafted from lead-free crystal, each piece rejects a single cup for the opulence of two. A matching decanter, a water jug and glasses are also available.
details: Measurements: H: 8.5 cm / Dia. 23.2 cm/Capacity:  450 ml
Sold in a box of 2 pcs

title: Raki & Water Glasses Set
name: Raki & Water, Anason
unit: Sold In A Box Of 6 Pcs
description: Raki is frequently drunk with water. The Anason Raki glasses is a set of 6 glasses that feature a beautiful combination of function and pure pleasure. Anason collection consists of high quality crystalline glasses, that are distinguised by their discreet curves. They offer an elegant approach to spirits' serving!
details: Measurements: H: 16.4 cm / Dia. 5.6 cm/Capacity:  120 ml
Sold in a box of 6 pcs

name: Whisky, Club

name: White  Pompom Teepee Tent

title: Tunisian Oval fruit bowl small
name: Olive Wood Oval fruit bowl
description: A Beautifiul Tunisian Olive wood slalad & fruit oval bowl with natural edge.Our Tunsian OliveWood bowls are true pieces of art. They are made by cutting, hollowing, and sanding the ancient olivewood.Each bowl is hand carved from a single piece of olive wood, giving it a smooth, seamless finish. Our large bowls are our most exquisite pieces as they are carved from hard to find large olive wood branches. Their deep, profound form displays a unique grain structure
details: Hand wash only, never put wood in the dishwasher.
* Clean with a soft sponge, warm water and soap.
* Dry with a soft cloth after cleaning.
* It is recommended to apply a coat with natural oil or vegetable on the piece occasionally to prevent drying of the wood.
* Avoid soaking in water or exposed to heat or sunlight

name: Olive wood Cheese Board

This olive wood Cheese/Bread Board are never made using bleach, dyes or chemicals. Present your fine homemade bread, and cheese, your French baguette or your favorite biscuits... at your next dinner party!
details: Hand wash only, never put wood in the dishwasher.
* Clean with a soft sponge, warm water and soap.
* Dry with a soft cloth after cleaning.

* Avoid soaking in water or exposed to heat or sunlight

title: Sister Light Lamp Alum.
name: Sister Light Table Lamp, Aluminium
description: Sister Light is a battery-operated portableand rechargeable table lamp. It is equippedwith an electronic control system monitorsthe remaining autonomy and ensuresconstant luminous flux until the batteryruns out. A customisable multifunctionaltouch control menu allows you to adjustthe light colour temperature to 2700-3350-4000K (dynamic white) and to setor exclude the 4-step dimmer function.The top of the lamp, fixed to the stem,can be converted to magnetic fixing anddetached to become an emergency light.The base of the lamp is designed to be mechanically fixed to a table. Rechargeable via USB, dimmable and portable
details: Suitable for outdoor and indoor use (IP65)
Impact resistance (IK07) and salt spray resistance (1500h)
Rechargeable and replaceable lithium battery pack
Battery lasts up to 58 h, if set to low power mode (6%)
Included: Charging cable with USB-c input and Kit for magnetic fixing
Ideal for commercial activities, restaurants, private homes and events

description: This collection is the result of the collaboration with a painter Guiseppe Saretta Vianello, who had already decorated some limited editions for Zafferano. MANNAGIA LI PESCETTI is made and hand-painted in Italian dishwasher and microwave safe stoneware. It comes in four different patterns: fish, seabed, wave, and sea, all available in blue or grey colour. The collection offers a mix & match combination of the various patterns. Any apparent imperfections and differences in each item are the result of decoration done by hand, and therefore always different and distinctive which attests the quality and exclusivity of the object.
details: Stoneware with handmade blue wave pattern Mannaggia li Pescetti collection dessert plate.
imageTitle: Mannaggia Li Pescetti Stoneware Dessert Plate - Blue Wave

title: Tue Porcelain Dinner Plate Set
name: Tue Porcelain Plate - Blue Stripes
unit: Sold In A Set Of 2 Pcs
description: The Tuesday Collection was designed to offer a product that is fun and yet functional at the same time. This Collection offers a game of colours with a new, even larger assortment of plates and bowls,  and coloured porcelain mugs. There are four different shapes of bowls and several types of plates with a myriad of designs. Each one unique, from stripes to flowery prints and alternating patterns. It is the ideal collection for those who want to set the table in an innovative way, choosing all the coordinated pieces or playing with contrasts and matching colours and patterns.

title: Tue Porcelain Mug
name: Tue Porcelain Mug - Blue Flowers
description: The TUE coloured porcelain cups are designed to make your breakfast, tea or coffee break special. They can be matched with our other porcelain lines or combined with our coloured glassware collections.

title: Amber Glass Tumbler Set
name: Veneziano Tumbler- Amber
unit: Sold In A Set Of 6 Pcs
description: This creation by Federico de Majo originates from the Venetian technique of working glass by hand therefore unique in detail in every piece. By blowing the incandescent paste into a specific diamond-shaped mould, the glasses take on the classic facets defined "ballotòn". The Veneziano line of glasses comes in eight colour options. Carafes are also available in the same style to match with.

title: Perle Tumbler Aquamarine Set
name: Perle Tumbler Aquamarine
unit: Sold In A Set Of 2 Pcs
description: This collection is made with an old method of working the glass, that of applying a twist to the glass and breaking it, which Zafferano has taken up again in the creation of Perle, a tableware series in coloured and transparent glass, complete with water, wine and soft drinks tumblers, cheerful and brightly-coloured carafes and bowls, all created to embellish the variegation of the elegance at the table.The Perle line has an extraordinarily charming effect thanks to the blend of transparency and vitreous ceramic body, obtained by combining unique materials with a particular method of working the glass completely by hand that is skilfully interpreted by the master glassblowers.
details: Set of 2 glasses in a box

title: Amethyst Glass Tumbler Set
name: Tirache Glass Tumbler - Green Amethyst
description: A Federico de Majo design, these hand-made glasses boast of alternating colours curling up from the base of the glass. The two shaded streamers bring out the thickness and embellished shapes of these transparent glasswares. Uniqueness and detail in every piece.

title: Small bowl - Blue Set
name: Small bowl stoneware Pàtera Blue
unit: Sold In A Set Of 4 Pcs
description: The Pàtera collection, designed by Federico de Majo, is made and hand-painted in Italy, in dishwasher-safe and microwave-resistant stoneware.It consists of three bowls - ideal for aperitifs, traditional or fusion soups, salads and icecream - and rice serving dish, which can also be used to individually serve a main course. The thickness of the stoneware maintains the food temperature for longer.The items are available in six shades of colour: pink, beige, blue, ochre, yellow and green. New and intense, these colours are inspired by the shades of the Mediterranean landscape. The bowls are available in two versions: entirely painted in solid colour or coloured on the outside and white on the inside. They feature a small coloured circle on the bottom which recalls the distinctive element of the Bilia, Petoni and Party collections, allowing for countless mix and match combinations.Any apparent imperfections are distinctive features which attest the quality and the exclusivity of the hand-decorated object.

title: Porcelain Mini Bowl Set
name: Tue Porcelain Mini Bowl Black
unit: Sold In A Set Of 6 Pcs
description: The Tuesday Collection was designed to offer a product that is fun and yet functional at the same time. This Collection offers a game of colours with a new, even larger assortment of plates and bowls,  and coloured porcelain mugs. There are four different shapes of bowls and several types of plates with a myriad of designs. Each one unique, from stripes to flowery prints and alternating patterns. It is the ideal collection for those who want to set the table in an innovative way, choosing all the coordinated pieces or playing with contrasts and matching colours and patterns.

unit: Sold In A Set Of 2 Pcs
description: The Tuesday Collection was designed to offer a product that is fun and yet functional at the same time. This Collection offers a game of colours with a new, even larger assortment of plates and bowls,  and coloured porcelain mugs. There are four different shapes of bowls and several types of plates with a myriad of designs. Each one unique, from stripes to flowery prints and alternating patterns. It is the ideal collection for those who want to set the table in an innovative way, choosing all the coordinated pieces or playing with contrasts and matching colours and patterns.

title: Blue Glass Carafe
name: Blue Glass Carafe
description: This creation by Federico de Majo originates from the application of a typically Venetian technique of working glass. By blowing the incandescent paste into a specific diamond-shaped mould, the carafes take on the classic facets defined “ballotòn”. Worked by hand, in hand- glass, the Veneziano line of carafe comes in eight colours options. In the same style there are also glasses to match with all the colours.
